dfm.disk.hidden.name: Hide disks
dfm.disk.hidden.description[zh_CN]: 用于配置磁盘隐藏，该数组中包含了需要隐藏的磁盘的UUID
dfm.disk.hidden.description: It's used to configure disk hiding. This array contains the UUID of the disks that you may want to hide.

bookmark.name: Bookmarks
bookmark.description[zh_CN]: 将需要显示的书签对象存储在数组中
bookmark.description: It stores the bookmark objects that need to be displayed in an array.

dfm.menu.hidden.name: Hide menus
dfm.menu.hidden.description: It's used to hide the whole menu.

dfm.menu.action.hidden.name: Hide menu options in File Manager
dfm.menu.action.hidden.description: It's used to hide the specified menu options in File Manager.

dd.menu.action.hidden.name: Hide menu options on desktop
dd.menu.action.hidden.description: It's used to hide the specified menu options on desktop.

dfd.menu.action.hidden.name: Hide menu options in file selection dialogs
dfd.menu.action.hidden.name[zh_CN]: 文件对话框菜单项隐藏
dfd.menu.action.hidden.description: It's used to hide the specified menu options in file selection dialogs.
dfd.menu.action.hidden.description[zh_CN]: 隐藏文件对话框指定菜单项

dfm.menu.protocoldev.enable.name: Enable the display of context menus for protocol devices
dfm.menu.protocoldev.enable.name[zh_CN]: 启用网络协议设备显示右键扩展菜单
dfm.menu.protocoldev.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否在网络协议设备上显示右键扩展菜单
dfm.menu.protocoldev.enable.description: It's used to control whether to display context menus for protocol devices.

dfm.menu.blockdev.enable.name: Enable the display of context menus for removable block devices
dfm.menu.blockdev.enable.name[zh_CN]: 启用可移动块设备显示右键扩展菜单
dfm.menu.blockdev.enable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否在块设备上显示右键扩展菜单
dfm.menu.blockdev.enable.description: It's used to control whether to display context menus for removable block devices.

dfm.vault.algo.name.name: The encryption algorithm of File Vault
dfm.vault.algo.name.description: The default one is State Cryptographic Algorithm (sm4-128-ecb), and you can choose International Data Encryption Algorithm (aes-256-gcm) as well.
dfm.vault.algo.name.description[zh_CN]: 保险箱加密算法，默认为国密算法(sm4-128-ecb),可选国际算法(aes-256-gcm)

dfm.samba.permanent.name: Keep showing the mounted Samba shares
dfm.samba.permanent.name[zh_CN]: Samba共享端常驻显示挂载入口
dfm.samba.permanent.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否常驻显示Samba的挂载入口，即便其没有挂载
dfm.samba.permanent.description: It's used to control whether to keep showing the mounted Samba shares, even when unmounted.

dfm.mount.dlnfs.name: Extend characters of file names
dfm.mount.dlnfs.description[zh_CN]: 扩展文件名字符数需重启后才能生效
dfm.mount.dlnfs.description: To extend characters of file names, you should restart to make the configuration effective.

dfm.mount.dlnfs.defaults.name: Dirs that support long file names
dfm.mount.dlnfs.defaults.name[zh_CN]: 启用长文件名扩展的目录
dfm.mount.dlnfs.defaults.description[zh_CN]: 默认启用长文件名扩展的目录
dfm.mount.dlnfs.defaults.description: Dirs that support long file names by default.

dfm.trash.allfiletotrash.name: Files normally deleted from peripheral and network paths go into the trash
dfm.trash.allfiletotrash.name[zh_CN]: 从外设和网络挂载设备nas盘中删除的文件会进入到回收站
dfm.trash.allfiletotrash.description[zh_CN]: 从外设和网络挂载设备nas盘中删除的文件会进入到回收站
dfm.trash.allfiletotrash.description: Files normally deleted from peripheral and network paths are moved to the trash.

dd.disabled.name: Disable Desktop
dd.disabled.description[zh_CN]: 如果值为true，DDE桌面将不加载任何插件，无桌面窗口
dd.disabled.description: If the value is true, the DDE Desktop will not load any plugins and no desktop will be shown.

dfm.headless.name: Enable dde-file-manger headless
dfm.headless.name[zh_CN]: 启用文件管理器常驻进程
dfm.headless.description[zh_CN]: 如果值为true，文件管理器将常驻后台，牺牲内存来换取热启动速度
dfm.headless.description: If the value is true, File Manager will be as a daemon, sacrificing memory to quicken the warm start.

dfm.memory.autorelease.name: Automatically release memory for desktop and dde-file-manager
dfm.memory.autorelease.name[zh_CN]: 自动释放桌面和文管的内存
dfm.memory.autorelease.description[zh_CN]: 如果值为true，文管和桌面在内存达到一定的阈值时，会自动将空闲的内存还给操作系统
dfm.memory.autorelease.description: If the value is true, the filemanager and desktop will automatically return free memory to system when the memory reaches a certain threshold

dfm.operate.bigfilesize.name: Big File
dfm.operate.bigfilesize.description[zh_CN]: 用于拷贝时判断文件是否是大文件的size
dfm.operate.bigfilesize.description: Size used to determine whether a file is a large file during copying
